original_title: Merveilles de l'UNESCO: Croatie, carrefour des civilisations
overview: Croatian identity has been marked throughout its history by the influence of different historical periods and empires that have occupied the country. True cultural crossroads, Croatia was the scene of Roman, Byzantine, Venetian, Hungarian and French invasions of which it still bears the scars.
title: Merveilles de l'UNESCO: Croatie, carrefour des civilisations
